programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy drama starring Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins. Media tycoon William Parrish has lived a rich life in every sense, but fears that his days are numbered. He is offered a temporary reprieve, however, when Death takes over the body of an attractive young man and decides to spend some quality time on Earth. The stranger is drawn to Parrish's daughter, Susan, but she's puzzled by his failure to recognise her from an earlier meeting Martin Brest - Director Brad Pitt - Joe Black / Young man in coffee shop Anthony Hopkins - William Parrish Claire Forlani - Susan Parrish Jake Weber - Drew Marcia Gay Harden - Allison Jeffrey Tambor - Quince David S Howard - Eddie Sloane Lois Kelly-Miller - Jamaican woman Brad Pitt - Joe Black / Young man in coffee shop Anthony Hopkins - William Parrish Claire Forlani - Susan Parrish Jake Weber - Drew Marcia Gay Harden - Allison Jeffrey Tambor - Quince David S Howard - Eddie Sloane Lois Kelly-Miller - Jamaican woman.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday
programme.desc: Troubleshooter Mike Fallon, aka the Accident Man, must beat the world's top assassins to protect the ungrateful son of a mob boss, and save the life of his only friend. Mike also attempts to rekindle his relationship with his maniacal father figure. Crime comedy sequel, co-written by and starring Scott Adkins, with Perry Benson, and Ray Stevenson in one of his final films George Kirby - Director Harry Kirby - Director Scott Adkins - Mike Fallon Ray Stevenson - Big Ray Perry Benson - Finicky Fred Sarah Chang - Wong Siu-ling George Fouracres - Dante Zuuzer Scott Adkins - Mike Fallon Ray Stevenson - Big Ray Perry Benson - Finicky Fred Sarah Chang - Wong Siu-ling George Fouracres - Dante Zuuzer.

programme.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Georgia Groome. With her 15th birthday fast approaching, Georgia Nicolson has two aims in life - to throw the greatest party ever and persuade local hunk Robbie to become her first boyfriend. programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.sub-title: Drama, Documentary And Factual, History, Thriller, Crime/detective ║ 2012 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action thriller based on a true story, starring Jessica Chastain. After the 9/11 terrorist attacks, the hunt for al-Qaeda leader Osama Bin Laden intensifies and pressure grows on CIA agent Maya and her colleagues to bring him to justice. programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. Decades later, Winton's records of the mission reawaken painful memories of the youngsters he couldn't save - and set him on an unexpected path to laying his ghosts to rest James Hawes - Director Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor Anthony Hopkins - Nicholas Winton Helena Bonham Carter - Babette Winton Johnny Flynn - Nicholas, as a young man Lena Olin - Grete Winton Romola Garai - Doreen Warriner Jonathan Pryce - Martin Blake Ziggy Heath - Martin Blake, as a young man Adrian Rawlins - Geoff Samantha Spiro - Esther Rantzen Marthe Keller - Betty Maxwell Alex Sharp - Trevor.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Gary Sinise and Robin Wright. programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, History, War, Documentary And Factual ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.desc: Full coverage of the Premier League game against Chelsea.

programme.desc: John O'Shea and Phil Jones discuss the Reds' Premier League game against Chelsea, plus exclusive post-match interviews with the manager and players.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Fletcher
programme.desc: Helen and Sam caught up with former Manchester United and Scotland midfielder Darren Fletcher. Fletch gives the podcast team a fascinating insight into his career and his current and future plans.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Scholes
programme.desc: The United Legend talks to the Pod about the heartbreak of missing out on the Champions League Final, his retirement U-turn and those 'mistimed' tackles.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Cantona
programme.desc: The King talks to the Pod about his famous "seagulls following the trawler" press conference, his unique celebration against Sunderland and the meaning of life.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Saha
programme.desc: The Frenchman opens up about his struggles with injury, Sir Alex reducing him to tears and how he forced through his transfer from Fulham.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Schmeichel
programme.desc: The Great Dane talks to Helen, Maysie and Alex Bruce about his explosive bust-up with Sir Alex, the historic Treble in 1999, and how he regrets leaving the club.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Whiteside
programme.desc: The Pod team set up in Norman's local where he recalls tales with Bryan Robson & Paul McGrath, and takes the guys back to his incredible rise to fame at the age of 17.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Nani
programme.desc: Former United winger Nani joins the Pod via video chat all the way from Orlando, where they look back on some of the iconic and strange moments in his time at Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Fortune
programme.desc: The happiest man in football talks to the Pod about his tough upbringing in South Africa and the incredible journey to Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Yorke
programme.desc: United Legend Dwight Yorke joins us from his home in Dubai to look back on his incredible career, and how an early childhood car accident may have influenced his outlook on life.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Robin van Persie
programme.desc: RVP talks to the Pod about facing United with Arsenal in that famous 8-2 victory, his joy at finally winning the Premier League, and what it was like to work with Louis van Gaal.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast: Phil Neville
programme.desc: The former United defender looks back on his Premier League career including a flashpoint with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Andy Cole
programme.desc: The United Legend looks back on his incredible Premier League career from start to finish. Coley also opens up about his battle with illness in recent years, in an emotional episode of the UTD Podcast.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Rashford
programme.desc: The United and England forward looks back on an incredible year both on and off the pitch. We hear everything from the nerve-wracking penalty in Paris to forcing two UK government U-turns.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Odion Ighalo
programme.desc: The Nigerian striker shares his incredible journey to Old Trafford. Odion also revealed how he used to save up his dinner money to pay to watch United play at weekends.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Leah Galton
programme.desc: Leah reveals how Casey Stoney convinced her to forget her Leeds allegiances and join her project at Manchester United.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Mark Hughes
programme.desc: Sparky walks us through his many successful years at Old Trafford and the thinking behind his decision to manage Man City years later.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Ruud van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: The goalscoring machine looks back on his career; how a move to Old Trafford nearly fell apart, his rivalry with Arsenal, and training with Cristiano Ronaldo.
